summary: The Bicycle Commuter Act of 2025 amends the Internal Revenue Code to reinstate and expand employer-provided fringe benefits for bicycle commuting. It repeals the suspension of these benefits, broadens the definition of qualified commuting property to include various types of bicycles and scooters, and modifies the limitation on the exclusion. The act aims to encourage bicycle commuting by offering tax incentives and applies to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
